title: saruc
author: saruc
content: Hiring discord mods!DM with previous experience on discord Saru#6517Up to 150$/week

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: I will dm you on you discord now You can see my services here with my previous experiences https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439410

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Sent you friend request in Discord.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on March 25, 2023, 12:12:47 PMI will dm you on you discord now You can see my services here with my previous experiences https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439410I can vouch for GxSTxV and his moderator work. I used him on a project and he did a very good job for me. He will familiarize himself with the project and be an assett to your community.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: saruc on March 25, 2023, 08:16:21 AMHiring discord mods!DM with previous experience on discord Saru#6517Up to 150$/weekPlease specify the type of group you want to manage, and the number of working hours per week and how it will be organized daily.It would also be good to know how many managers you intend to hire.Feel free to contact me (forum pm or telegram @kavelj22) with necessary details, but it would be better if you can provide details here publicly.Quote from: yahoo62278 on March 25, 2023, 05:41:18 PMQuote from: GxSTxV on March 25, 2023, 12:12:47 PMI will dm you on you discord now You can see my services here with my previous experiences https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439410I can vouch for GxSTxV and his moderator work. I used him on a project and he did a very good job for me. He will familiarize himself with the project and be an assett to your community.I had no trade with GxSTxV or engaged with him in a project, but I can also confirm that he is an honest user and a very kind person and be an asset to your project. I know him from my local community (arabic board) where we use to discuss.Cheers,Kavelj22

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: Hi @saruc. If you're still hiring more mods I am interested. I will be sending a DM.

comments.author: Etag_loc
comments.body: Giving a detailed job description that specifies the role's duties and responsibilities, as well as essential project specifics, may be extremely valuable to the OP and the person who is applying. That will also save both parties time, so please share all of the details.Regards

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Hi, @sarucI sent you a friend request in "Discord". I have experience as a "Trade Race Manager & Citizen Conflict" from Company Called QORPO", starting from only "admin" and now have experience.- Moderator- Handling other admin work & checking activity.- Have experience handling collecting payment address - Other side tasks (Like some request duty from a core team members)- Etc.I'm still working for QORPO Company, and now in my third year with them. If you want to see me on QORPO, feel free to accept my request discord Clayyy#9428. Thank you!

comments.author: dbc23
comments.body: I haven't moderated on discord but I have done something similar to moderation job on telegram and WhatsApp can I still drop my application?

comments.author: StanCrypt
comments.body: Hi, @Saruc I have experience as a "operations coordinator" from Company Called Bolt".Some of my primary duties were- Organizing and moderating meetings with clients(telegram and Whatapp).- Coordinating administrative work & checking activity.-  Experience in Coordinating team's work plans.- Etc.With my experience I can manage any community on Discord no matter how large.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.created_time: March 29, 2023, 02:58:19 AMLast edit: March 29, 2023, 05:19:24 AM by ryzaadit
comments.body: Hi everyone!I just want to give you an update, this discord hiring is a scam one days before my discord account was hacked. I was in touch and in contact with the @OP, but after that, my account discord got hacked.During the hack, @OP deleted the all-conversation and kicked me out of the discord group he was for the hiring. My last activity for connecting any link is with him, probably the bot verified mee6 group was fake.@OP looking someone who are working in discord mod. My suggestion, don't apply or click any link from @OPRead my story here, I'm give some proof: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5446723.msg61996354#msg61996354

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on March 29, 2023, 02:58:19 AMDuring the hack, @OP deleted the all-conversation and kicked me out of the discord group he was for the hiring. My last activity for connecting any link is with him, probably the bot verified mee6 group was fake.Sorry, it's bad.Did you clean up your device, reset it to factory settings, wipe out your operation system and change password of all your accounts?

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.created_time: March 29, 2023, 03:57:24 AMLast edit: March 29, 2023, 05:15:31 AM by ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on March 29, 2023, 03:42:46 AMsnip-Yes, the hacker @OP posted exactly my time zone sleep. I also mention this during a conversation with him, I already change my password account and un-link the connection device (It's from Italy). I don't know how, but I have 2FA active on my account and he still can get into my account (edits, seem like the bot requested token that's why with 2FA still can be bypass).The only one who are getting hacked is my discord account, and that hacked is after contacting with him 1-2 days. Any interaction it's only from his group, and guess what the verification MEE6 it's from domain .app

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Responding in my scam assumption already.The link discord channel for hiring it's from your, joined to your group and faked verification is listed on your discord channel. Interaction link who are make my account getting hacked is after with you (one day after with you).I just check, the MEE6 link it's fake.1. MEE6 Bot (It's verified: real)2. However, the direction link for verified like captcha is fake (Drag me click for verification) on fake website requesting a token to bypass 2FA and Email. Beware, I will not responding in here again only on my scam assumption thread.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on March 29, 2023, 02:58:19 AMSnipI think I’m very lucky that I didn't proceed with the OP request. I had a feeling that something was off with his questions that wasn’t about moderating exactly. I suspect that his intention was to steal valuable Discord accounts as his inquired about my status as a moderator in other servers when i told him about me moderating more Telegram servers he was focusing only with Discord servers knowing it’s the same knowledge and service any moderator would offer from any platform . Most likely his goal was to hack into our accounts and attempt to extort payment from the servers that had hired us.It's important from us to be extremely cautious when dealing with offers like this particularly when the other party begins askig for personal informations. And I'm sorry to hear about your experience and I appreciate you taking the time to warn us.
